mods.name: VA10k
mods.description: An interesting pack of weapons#ranging from Martials to Sinusoids

mods.name: Feels Like Vanilla
mods.description: 16 simple but unique#vanilla-style weapons#with a wide range of#designs and functions.

mods.name: Bosses Plus
mods.description: Adds Giga Maggot,#Big Sniper,#and Titank is here#as a special guest!

mods.name: Blaacskills
mods.description: A set of weapon mutations#that expand the pool and#provide new meta opportunities!

mods.name: LOMuts Lite
mods.description: Lots of Mutations!#What it sounds like on the tin.#Ultras and#some extra mechanics#are removed.

mods.name: Portalspeed
mods.description: When you clear a level,#get a speed boost#to get to the#next level faster!

mods.name: Horsie
mods.description: This mod adds Horsie,#a new playable character, #with a rushdown-centric playstyle.

mods.name: Shrimpstol
mods.description: This mod adds Shrimpstol#as a new character,#as his name says,#its a Pistol Shrimp but Mutated

mods.name: Acrobat
mods.description: This mod adds Acrobat,#an agile mutant that#eeks the throne for reasons unknown!

mods.name: Writhe
mods.description: This Nuclear Throne mod adds Writhe,#a tangled mess of a mutant#who doesn't really know what's going on.
